name: Grant Policies to Groups
description: Walkthrough on granting policies for groups.

steps.message: In this tutorial we will guide you how to apply policies to groups.</br> A policy specifies who can have access which OCI resource that your company has, and how.

Click the menu button on top left. Scroll down to "Identity" and click "Policies".
{{img-url:/images/tutorials/idpolicies.png}}

Click "Create Policy". Add a "Name" and a "Description".
You can choose to have the policy expire or stay current. Next we will actually add our policies.

Each statement follows this basic syntax:
Allow group to in compartment .
Some cases you may want to apply to a tenancy, heres an example: Allow group to in tenancy. Tip: Policies only allow access, they cannot deny it.
{{img-url:/images/tutorials/idstatements.png }}

For this tutorial add the common admin policy: Allow group to manage All Resources in compartment .
Replacing and with the previous created. Tip: Here are common policies you may encounter and use.
Congratulations, current group users now have access to recourses specified!
